contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 16, 1991 D Reading Contest (Third Section)
Reading Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Reading Contest reading-contest-third-section
Coriolanus
Alfred Sutton Girls School, Reading, Berkshire, England, UK The program contains a formatting error between bands and conductors - all bands are listed next to the conductor of the band below (i.e. alphabetically after), with the exception of Bedworth (who start the list), and Yeovil, who finish the list, and are listed correctly. Wotton-under-Edge are listed against W. Gray, who was the conductor of Wootton Bassett band at this time, who competed in the fourth section at the contest. It is not clear whether they also competed in the third section.
April 21, 2013, 3:44 p.m. Oct. 22, 2014, 12:40 p.m.
1 Stoke-sub-Hamdon Gary Greenstock
2 Bedworth Brass Brian E Clarke
3 Moulton '77 Band D. A. Clark
Unknown Result A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band M. Woolas

Unknown Result Croydon Brass Band Matthew Hackett
